channel.title: Pvp annoyance
channel.description:
I'm sick to death of people in pvp avoiding the system, they'll be in the middle of a fight realize they're screwed then logout, login on another account try to kill you, or wait about 5 hours and check if the coast is clear on their new accounts, then log back in.
This just renders PvP useless, as everyone can cheat the system and never die.
